definition: a handcart that has a frame with two low wheels and a ledge at the bottom and handles at the top, convey (goods etc.) by truck
details:
noun
- a handcart that has a frame with two low wheels and a ledge at the bottom and handles at the top
= synonyms: hand truck
- an automotive vehicle suitable for hauling
= synonyms: motortruck
verb
- convey (goods etc.) by truck
= example: convey (goods etc.) by truck
